summonsRequired.description: Indicates if this party is required to be summonsed

notificationRequired.description: Indicates if this party is required to be notified of the application proceedings

appointmentNotificationRequired.description: Indicates if this party is required to be notified of the application proceedings that are planned by telephone appointment.  Typically applies to the subject of the application

personDetails.description: Provided when the party is a person

organisation.description: Provided when the party is an organisation

organisationPersons.description: Array of persons in the organisation where the party is an organisation
